verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Stand fast in the liberty
Wherein Christ Jesus has set us free,
Take every thought into captivity.
Stand fast in the liberty. (Repeat.)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Though we stumble we yet shall arise.
We'll forsake all the enemy's lies.
God will surely answer our cries
As we stand in the liberty.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Jesus hath proclaimed a year of release.
Now we can walk in love, joy and peace.
Our bondage to sin and death shall cease
As we stand in the liberty.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Now we behold with an open face
The one who called us by His glory and grace.
From glory to glory a change takes place
As we stand in the liberty.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Why should I look with the natural eye,
Without beholding Him who is higher than I?
With wings of an eagle He'll cause me to fly
As I stand in the liberty.
